title: Remove branch management links to create clean Development Task interface
description: Eliminate Branch, PR created and ready for development, and Rebase links from the Development Task UI to reduce visual clutter and complexity, creating a streamlined interface that focuses developers on essential task management without distracting branch operations
iWant: to remove Branch, PR created, and Rebase links from the Development Task interface
soThat: I can work with a simple and clean task management interface without unnecessary branch management distractions
acceptanceCriteria: Branch link is completely removed from Development Task UI
PR created and ready for development link is eliminated
Rebase link is removed from the interface
Development Task core functionality remains fully operational
